name: Hugging Face API Key
help: An API Key that gives access to Hugging Face

name: Labels of interest
help: Comma separated list of labels from "AudioSet" dataset that will be used to label the sample. When model returns any other label, the label in Edge Impulse will be set to "noise". To get all the labels from "AudioSet", use None or none

name: How to call labels of interest
help: A label that should be assigned to samples that classify with the labels mentioned above

name: Window size (ms)
help: Size of the window for each classification. If set to 0, samples will be labeled with one label per sample, as opposed to structured labels.
